mapper.insert: INSERT INTO point (id, member_id, category, point, type, created_at, deleted_at, status) VALUES (#{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{point, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{deletedAt, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status})
